sentences: On Saturday, IPCC Secretary Renate Christ introduced the IPCC's draft budget for 2008-2010 (IPCC-XXVII/Doc.4, Add.1).
She highlighted a proposed increase for outreach activities and for translating the technical paper on climate change and water.
The Netherlands expressed concern with year-to-year fluctuations in budget contributions and called for long-term planning based on a multi-year analysis of contributions.
The Secretary agreed to refer the proposal for discussion at future meetings of the working group on finance.
The UK supported the budget, stressing the importance of scoping meetings.
The budget was approved without further discussion.
